Project Nature: "(T26) The project is for the implementation and maintenance of a digital identity system (the System) which consists of cloud-based back end systems running container-based applications and mobile apps. The System provides Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) for access by other government systems and non-government systems to perform authentication, form filling, digital signing and other functions with the consent of the mobile app users. The project team will be responsible for the platform operations, maintenance and development work as well as to provide necessary technical support to Bureau/ Departments (B/Ds) for integrating their online services with the System."
Duties: "- Serve a contract assignment under InfoTech's headcount, full-time second to serve the DPO; ;The CSA will be required to: ;- monitor and perform programming enhancement, prepare test cases and co-ordinate different types of testing with various stakeholders; ;- liaise and collaborate with various parties for supporting system design, implementation, maintenance, troubleshooting for the enhancements of the System; ;- prepare and review system documentation; ;- oversee application development lifecycle and conduct the release management for mobile applications and backend systems; ;- support incident/issue handling for round-the-clock running systems; and ;- perform any other duties as assigned by the supervisor. ;"
Requirements: "The candidate should possess: ;- sound knowledge and solid experience in application development for mobile applications in iOS and Android, virtualisation technology, MySQL/MariaDB database support and Java programming; ;- sound knowledge and solid experience related to public key infrastructure, digital certificate related technologies and blockchain related technologies and solutions, especially in identity management; ;- sound knowledge and solid experience in system design, development, implementation and maintenance of IT application systems using web services and RESTful APIs; ;- sound knowledge and solid experience in mini-program infrastructure and application development of uni-app framework for mini-program; ;- solid working experience in providing technical advice and support to different users and clients; ;- good sense of analytical and problem-solving skills; ;- good command of English and Chinese writing skills; ;- good communication and interpersonal skills; and ;- communication using Putonghua will be required. ;The candidate preferably possesses: ;- solid experience in version control system (e.g. Git); and ;- solid experience in working in government IT projects. ;Technical Skills: ;. At least 4 years' experience in JavaScript Programming (JAP); ;. At least 4 years' experience in JAVA Programming (JAV); ;. At least 4 years' experience in Web Services (WSV); ;. At least 3 years' experience in System Implementation and Maintenance/Support (SIM); ;. At least 3 years' experience in IT Application Development and Management (ADM); ;. At least 1 year's experience in Mobile / Wireless Communication (MWC); ;. 2 years' experience in Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) is an advantage; ;. 2 years' experience in Cryptography (CRY) is an advantage; ;. 2 years' experience in IT Security (ITS) is an advantage. ;Non-technical Skills: ;. Good spoken English is a must; ;. Good Putonghua is a must; ;. Good written English is a must; ;. At least 1 year's experience in vendor management (VMG); ;. 3 years' experience in work with the Government (GOV) is an advantage; ;. 2 years' experience in project development in specified business areas (PDE) is an advantage. ;- Bachelor's degree/Higher Diploma in Computer Science, IT or equivalent; ;- At least 4 years' post-qualification experience in which at least 1 year's relevant experience in a similar post and in a comparable capacity."

Project Nature: "(T26) The project is to enhance and renew an existing core network infrastructure to support various IT initiatives and projects including new data center network implementation, IP-based Telephone System projects and mobile network solution projects. The tasks also involve project management and infrastructure planning."
Duties: "- Serve a contract assignment under InfoTech's headcount, full-time second to serve the HKPF; ;The candidate will need to, ;(a) implement core network infrastructure enhancements, new network system and sub-systems and migration of production systems to the new or enhanced network systems and sub-systems; ;(b) design and implement new data center network system, including network migration between data centers; ;(c) implement new or enhanced site networks; ;(d) manage the network implementation projects including planning, liaison with vendors and internal technical teams and users, contract management, procurement, quality assurance and all other matters related to the successful implementation of the network connections. ;"

Location Base: DPO offices in TWGO and Government Complex in Cheung Sha Wan
Project Nature: "(T26) Network cabling infrastructure in the Government Complex is designed in form of a Structured Cabling System (SCS) which comprised of two major components namely Horizontal Cabling System and Vertical Cabling System. Horizontal Cabling System refers to the connections on the same floor while Vertical Cabling System refers to the backbone connections across different floors. Network cabling services to be provided by the term contractor, including installation, testing, production rollout, maintenance and other related services, on the same floor and across different floors within the buildings, are required for the tenants of the buildings from various Government Departments to build up their network systems."
Duties: "- Serve a contract assignment under InfoTech's headcount, full-time second to serve the DPO; ;This is a CSA position responsible for operating, supporting and maintenance of the SCS in the Complex. ;1. Manage and maintain the centralized database/ data files containing the information of the SCS installed in the Complex and to ensure the data integrity of the database/ data files with proper change control and regular data backup. ;2. Review the cabling service requirements of the Complex tenants and manage the port assignment of the fibre cables installed in the communal equipment racks. ;3. Perform regular on-site inspection and monitoring on the cabling work performed by the contractor to oversee their performance and to enforce compliance to contractual obligations. ;4. Perform end-to-end networking troubleshooting and technical support with users by using computer networking s/w tools, or hardware tester. ;5. Perform sample testing on the SCS to ensure the quality of the SCS installed and perform troubleshooting when necessary, by using the related cable testers and tools. ;6. Work with other IT officers to coordinate with the contractor and the Complex tenants on providing technical support on the SCS in the Complex. ;"
Requirements: "1. With knowledge and experience in using Networking IT knowledge (e.g. using ping commands), Linux Server, server virtualization and Linux shell scripting. ;2. With solid knowledge and experience in IT supporting and troubleshooting Ethernet network. ;3. In addition to the permanent office located at TWGO, the staff will be required to work at the Government Complex in Cheung Sha Wan. ;4. Need to work outside office hours occasionally in scheduled and non-scheduled manner e.g. ah hoc remote or on-site support for troubleshooting and fire-fighting. ;5. Criminal record check is required. ;Technical Skills: ;. At least 2 years' experience in Ethernet (ETH); ;. At least 2 years' experience in Networking (NET); ;. At least 1 year's experience in Network & System Management (NSM); ;. At least 1 year's experience in Server Virtualisation Technology (SVT); ;. At least 6 months' experience in Unix/Linux Shell Scripting (ULS). ;Non-technical Skills: ;. Good coordination skills is an advantage; ;. 6 months' experience in vendor management (VMG) is an advantage. ;- Bachelor's degree/Higher Diploma in Computer Science, IT or equivalent; ;- At least 4 years' post-qualification experience in which at least 1 year's relevant experience in a similar post and in a comparable capacity."
